name: postcss-uuid-obfuscator

0.0.2.name: postcss-uuid-obfuscator
0.0.2.description: This is a [PostCSS] plugin which works to hashing (randomizing) class-name with [UUID]. And also applying to HTML class-attribute, Javascript string replacing. This plugin is very inspired a [postcss-obfuscator], and thank you so much.

readme:
# PostCSS UUID Obfuscator ## : v1.2.1 - - fileIgnore - Node.js@24.0.0[hasha][@noble/hashes] --- [PostCSS][UUID] HTMLclassJavascriptPHP [gulp-postcss][gulp] (gulpfile.mjs) JS-APIPostCSS [postcss-obfuscator] PHP[2](#php) [PostCSS]: https://github.com/postcss/postcss [UUID]: https://github.com/uuidjs/uuid [gulp-postcss]: https://github.com/postcss/gulp-postcss [gulp]: https://gulpjs.com/ [postcss-obfuscator]: https://github.com/n4j1Br4ch1D/postcss-obfuscator [@noble/hashes]: https://github.com/paulmillr/noble-hashes --- ## - [PostCSS UUID Obfuscator](#postcss-uuid-obfuscator) - [: v1.2.1](#-v121) - [](#) - [](#) - [](#) - [](#) - [](#) - [gulp](#gulp) - [package.json](#packagejson) - [npm](#npm) - [](#) - [](#) - [](#) - [targetPath](#targetpath) - [npm.scripts](#npmscripts) - [HTML,Javascript](#htmljavascript) - [](#) - [JS-API](#js-api) - [package.json](#packagejson-1) - [npm ](#npm-) - [ ](#-) - [ ](#-) - [ ](#-) - [targetPath ](#targetpath-) - [1](#1) - [API](#api) - [options.enable](#optionsenable) - [options.length](#optionslength) - [options.retryCount](#optionsretrycount) - [options.classPrefix](#optionsclassprefix) - [options.classSuffix](#optionsclasssuffix) - [options.classIgnore](#optionsclassignore) - [options.fileIgnore](#optionsfileignore) - [options.jsonsPath](#optionsjsonspath) - [options.targetPath](#optionstargetpath) - [options.extensions](#optionsextensions) - [options.outputExcludes](#optionsoutputexcludes) - [options.scriptType](#optionsscripttype) - [options.keepData](#optionskeepdata) - [options.applyClassNameWithoutDot](#optionsapplyclassnamewithoutdot) - [options.preRun](#optionsprerun) - [options.callBack](#optionscallback) - [](#) - [PHP](#php) --- ## postcss-obfuscatorPostCSS UUID Obfuscator ### postcss-obfuscator`Math.random()` ### ```css .hoge{ color: red; } .fuga{ text-decoration: underline; } ``` CSS CSS**** ```html
``` ```javascript document.body.classList.add("hoge") ``` ```html
The "hoge" word should not be changed!
``` 3 ```javascript document.querySelector('.hoge')?.classList.length ``` querySelector, querySelectorAll, closestpostcss-obfuscator PostCSS UUID ObfuscatorHTMLJavascript HTMLclass --- ## ``` npm install postcss-uuid-obfuscator ``` --- ## gulp test/gulp ### package.json ```json { "scripts": { "clean": "gulp clean", "build": "gulp", "dev": "gulp dev" } } ``` scriptspackage.json ### npm ``` npm install autoprefixer dotenv fs-extra gulp gulp-connect-php gulp-if gulp-postcss gulp-rename gulp-sass postcss-csso postcss-uuid-obfuscator sass tailwindcss ``` npm SCSSTailwindCSSautoprefixerpostcss-csso `npx tailwindcss init` [TailwindCSS]: https://tailwindcss.com/ [autoprefixer]: https://github.com/postcss/autoprefixer [postcss-csso]: https://github.com/lahmatiy/postcss-csso ### ```javascript // Stream import { src, dest, series } from 'gulp' import fs from 'fs-extra' // SCSS import * as dartSass from 'sass' import gulpSass from 'gulp-sass' const sass = gulpSass(dartSass) // PostCSS import postcss from 'gulp-postcss' import autoprefixer from 'autoprefixer' import tailwindcss from 'tailwindcss' import csso from 'postcss-csso' import { cleanObfuscator, obfuscator, applyObfuscated } from 'postcss-uuid-obfuscator' ``` ESModule CommonJS (require) PostCSS UUID ObfuscatorcleanObfuscatorobfuscatorapplyObfuscated ### ```javascript // 1. npm run build, or npm run dev const isDev = /(^|[\s'"`])dev([\s'"`]|$)/.test(process.title) // 2. PostCSS UUID Obfuscator: JSON.map file path const jsonsPath = 'css-obfuscator' ``` 1. `process.title` 2. JSON ### ```javascript // CSS <= SCSS const task_css = done => { cleanObfuscator(jsonsPath) src('src/**/!(_)*.scss', { allowEmpty: true, }) .pipe(sass()) .pipe(postcss([ tailwindcss(), autoprefixer(), csso(), obfuscator({ enable: !isDev, length: 3, targetPath: 'dist', jsonsPath: jsonsPath, applyClassNameWithoutDot: true, classIgnore: ['scrollbar-track', 'scrollbar-thumb'], }) ])) .pipe(dest('dist')) done() } ``` PostCSS`cleanObfuscator(jsonsPath)` JSON `obfuscator({})`1 #### targetPath `targetPath`gulp srcdistdist ### npm.scripts ```javascript // npm run build export default series( // task_html, // task_js, task_css, task_applyObfuscate, ) // npm run dev export const dev = series( // task_html, // task_js, task_css, ) ``` `applyObfuscated()` CSSHTMLJavascript CSSHTMLJavascript ### HTML,Javascript ```javascript const task_applyObfuscate = done => { applyObfuscated() done() } ``` CSS`applyObfuscated()` HTMLJavascript ### ```javascript // npm run clean export const clean = series( task_clean, ) ``` ```javascript const task_clean = done => { if(fs.existsSync('dist')){ fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true}) } if(fs.existsSync(jsonsPath)){ fs.rmSync(jsonsPath, {recursive: true}) } done() } ``` --- ## JS-API test/postcss ### package.json ```json { "scripts": { "clean": "node build-clean.mjs", "common:html": "node build-html.mjs", "common:js": "node build-js.mjs", "build:css": "node build-css.mjs -- build", "dev:css": "node build-css.mjs -- build", "build": "run-s common:* build:*", "dev": "run-s common:* dev:*" } } ``` scriptspackage.json scriptcleanbuilddev3gulp CSS ### npm ``` npm install autoprefixer dotenv fs-extra glob npm-run-all2 path postcss postcss-csso postcss-uuid-obfuscator sass tailwindcss ``` npm SCSSTailwindCSSautoprefixerpostcss-csso `npx tailwindcss init` ### ```javascript // Files import { glob } from 'glob' import fs from 'fs-extra' import path from 'path' // SCSS import * as dartSass from 'sass' // PostCSS import postcss from 'postcss' import autoprefixer from 'autoprefixer' import tailwindcss from 'tailwindcss' import csso from 'postcss-csso' import { cleanObfuscator, obfuscator, applyObfuscated } from 'postcss-uuid-obfuscator' ``` ESModule CommonJS (require) PostCSS UUID ObfuscatorcleanObfuscatorobfuscatorapplyObfuscated ### ```javascript // 1. npm run build, or npm run dev const isDev = /(^|[\s'"`])dev:css/.test(process.title) // 2. PostCSS UUID Obfuscator: JSON.map file path const jsonsPath = 'css-obfuscator' // 3. counts task processed files let taskedFileCount = 0 let taskFiles = 0 ``` 1. `process.title` 2. JSON 3. PostCSS ### ```javascript // 3. apply obfuscated data to HTML, JS const apply = () => { taskedFileCount ++ if(taskedFileCount === taskFiles){ applyObfuscated() } } // PostCSS const task = async () => { // 1. initialize cleanObfuscator(jsonsPath) const files = await glob('src/css/**/!(_)*.scss', { ignore: 'node_modules/**', }) taskFiles = files.length // 2. PostCSS files.forEach(file => { const distPath = path.dirname(file).replace(/^src/, 'dist') + path.sep + path.basename(file).replace(/\.scss$/, '.css') let body = fs.readFileSync(file, { encoding: 'utf-8', }) body = dartSass.compile(file).css.replace(/[\t\r\n\s]+/g, ' ') postcss([ tailwindcss(), autoprefixer(), csso(), obfuscator({ enable: !isDev, length: 3, targetPath: 'dist', jsonsPath: jsonsPath, applyClassNameWithoutDot: true, classIgnore: ['scrollbar-track', 'scrollbar-thumb'], }) ]) .process(body, {from: file, to: distPath}) .then(res => { fs.ensureFileSync(res.opts.to) fs.writeFileSync(res.opts.to, res.css) apply() }) }) } task() ``` 1. PostCSS`cleanObfuscator(jsonsPath)` JSON `obfuscator({})`2 #### targetPath `targetPath`build-css.mjs srcdistdist #### 1 (`npm run dev`) PostCSS UUID Obfuscator (`npm run build`) SCSS 'index.scss'1 3. CSS`applyObfuscated()` HTMLJavascript --- ## API cleanObfuscatorapplyObfuscated obfuscator ```javascript const options = { enable, length, retryCount, classPrefix, classSuffix, classIgnore, fileIgnore, jsonsPath, targetPath, extensions, outputExcludes, scriptType, keepData, applyClassNameWithoutDot, preRun, callBack, } obfuscator(options) ``` ### options.enable : true (boolean) ### options.length [1](#) : 5 (number) ### options.retryCount [1](#) : 25 (number) ### options.classPrefix [1](#) : 'x--' (string) ### options.classSuffix [1](#) : '' (string) ### options.classIgnore : [] (string[]) `['scrollbar-track', 'scrollbar-thumb']` ### options.fileIgnore : [] (string[]) `['plugins.min.js']` ### options.jsonsPath JSON : 'css-obfuscator' (string) ### options.targetPath HTMLCSSJavascript : 'out' (string) ### options.extensions : {html: ['.html', '.htm'], javascript: ['.js'], php: ['.php']} [2](#php) > HTML[node-html-parser]Javascript[espree]PHP[gyros] JSXTypeScript`javascript: ['.ts']` [node-html-parser]: https://github.com/taoqf/node-html-parser [espree]: https://github.com/eslint/espree [gyros]: https://github.com/loilo/gyros ### options.outputExcludes : ['.webp', '.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.gif', '.ico', '.map', '.webmanifest', '.mp4', '.webm', '.ogg'] (string[]) `['.js', '.html']` ### options.scriptType Javascript : "script" (string) ESM .mjs "module" CommonJS.cjs "commonjs" ### options.keepData JSON : true (boolean) ### options.applyClassNameWithoutDot JavascriptPHP`.c-className``c-className` : false (boolean) false `document.querySelector()``document.querySelectorAll()``document.closest()` true`document.getElementsByClassName()``document.body.classList.add()` darkred ### options.preRun obfuscator (PostCSS) : () => Promise.resolve() (Promise.
